title: Volte in south korea
content: Since Google didn't release yet their Pixel 3 in South Korea, thanks Google, numerous we South Korean Pixel users are suffering from dissatisfied experience in using Pixel3. Especially we can't use Volte function via carriers in here. Yes we knew that this is totally our business. But, I'm wondering whether there are official routes to  deliver this issue to Pixel engineers to make updates in near future for many Korean fans!
